We refer to the above account.                                                                                                      
                                                                                                                                    
Despite our earlier correspondence/reminders to you, your account                                                                   
remains overdue.                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                    
Please take note that we would be compelled to cancel all card                                                                      
facilities that you hold and proceed with further recovery action                                                                   
including tagging and/or setting-off your banking account(s) with                                                                   
Maybank Islamic Berhad (if any), assign your account to our                                                                         
appointed Debt Collection Agency and/or to proceed with further                                                                     
legal action to recover the above amount.                                                                                           
                                                                                                                                    
In order to avoid any inconvenience or adverse record, we would                                                                     
appreciate if you could kindly effect the full minimum payment to                                                                   
us within 7 days from this letter.                                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                    
If payment has been made, please accept our thanks and kindly                                                                       
ignore this reminder. Please contact us at 03-20748090 once you                                                                     
have made full settlement or if further clarification is                                                                            
required.                                                                                                                           
                                                                                                                                    
Meanwhile, Bank Negara Malaysia has established Agensi Kaunseling                                                                   
dan Pengurusan Kredit (AKPK) to provide services on money                                                                           
management, credit counselling, financial education and debt                                                                        
restructuring for individuals. For enquiry, please call                                                                             
03-2616 7766.                                                                                                                       
                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                    
Thank you.

within 7 days from the date of this letter, failing which we will                                                                   
proceed to set-off/transfer to cover part of your outstanding                                                                       
balance from your banking accounts with Maybank. In the event                                                                       
your Maybank Credit card continue to be in default, we have no                                                                      
other alternative but to cancel all card products that you hold                                                                     
and proceed with further recovery action including assigning your                                                                   
account to our appointed Debt Collection Agency and/or to proceed                                                                   
with further legal action to recover the above amount.

ignore this reminder. Please contact us at 03-2074 8090 once you                                                                    
have made full settlement or if further clarification is                                                                            
required.

within 7 days from the date of this letter, failing which we will

balance from your banking accounts with Maybank. In the event                                                                       
your Maybank Credit card continue to be in default, we have no                                                                      
other alternative but to cancel all card products that you hold                                                                     
and proceed with further recovery action including assigning your                                                                   
account to our appointed Debt Collection Agency and/or to proceed                                                                   
with further legal action to recover the above amount.

ignore this reminder. Please contact us at 03-2074 8090 once you                                                                    
have made full settlement or if further clarification is                                                                            
required.

restructuring for individuals. For enquiry, please call 03-2616

within 7 days from the date of this letter, failing which we will                                                                   
proceed to set-off/transfer to cover part of your outstanding                                                                       
balance from your banking accounts with Maybank. In the event                                                                       
your Maybank Credit card continue to be in default, we have no                                                                      
other alternative but to cancel all card products that you hold                                                                     
and proceed with further recovery action including assigning your                                                                   
account to our appointed Debt Collection Agency and/or to proceed                                                                   
with further legal action to recover the above amount.                                                                              
                                                                                                                                    
If payment has been made, please accept our thanks and kindly                                                                       
ignore this reminder. Please contact us at 03-2074 8090 once you                                                                    
have made full settlement or if further clarification is                                                                            
required.                                                                                                                           
                                                                                                                                    
Meanwhile, Bank Negara Malaysia has established Agensi Kaunseling                                                                   
dan Pengurusan Kredit (AKPK) to provide services on money

restructuring for individuals. For enquiry, please call 03-2616                                                                     
7766.

products that you hold and proceed with further recovery action

Agency and/or to proceed with further legal action to recover the

products that you hold and proceed with further recovery action                                                                     
including tagging and/or setting-off your banking(s) with Maybank                                                                   
(if any), assign your account to our appointed Debt Collection                                                                      
Agency and/or to proceed with further legal action to recover the                                                                   
above amount.

products that you hold and proceed with further recovery action                                                                     
including tagging and/or setting-off your banking(s) with Maybank                                                                   
(if any), assign your account to our appointed Debt Collection                                                                      
Agency and/or to proceed with further legal action to recover the                                                                   
above amount.

appreciate if you could kindly effect the full minimum payment to                                                                   
us within 7 days from this letter.

ignore this reminder. Please contact us at 03-20748090 once you
